Posts.Content: Jvm wrote: I just had a biopsy on two larger masses and now waiting on the results.I know waiting for results isn't easy and I'm trying to keep a positive attitude despite the previous mammograms. I was told that attitude can help a lot. I just wish the biopsy results were a lot quicker. I also am not sure what to ask when it does come back. I know nothing about breast cancer and just found out recently that it is in the family. I wouldn't know the first thing to ask the doctor when they call with the results which was already stated to me to be highly suggestive of malignancy. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just biopsied and waiting on results Jvm snowsogal

Posts.Content: Dec 18, 2016 10:26PM Jvm wrote: thank you all for your support. I am glad to know it's ok to cry. Just don't want my kids to see me upset yet as I haven't told them anything until I know for sure and even then probably after Christmas. You have helped me with just responding and letting me know I'm not alone. Thank you so much
Posts.Title: Just biopsied and waiting on results Jvm snowsogal
